name: BannerMorningIUHoopsNewsbyTheAssemblyCall
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Banner Morning is a regular rundown of the most important Indiana basketball news from The Assembly Call. Hosted by Jerod Morris, this short flash briefing will keep you up-to-date on what's going on with your Hoosiers on the court and on the recruiting trail, with occasional nods to important historical events as well.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
